jSimPack
Interface BreakpointListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BreakpointPrinter, SwingDisplay
public interface BreakpointListener

Implement this class to register and respond to breakpoints in the future event list.

Method Summary
 void breakpointOccured(SimTime breakpointTime)
          This method is called when a breakpoint occurs.
 

Method Detail

breakpointOccured

void breakpointOccured(SimTime breakpointTime)
This method is called when a breakpoint occurs.

Parameters:
breakpointTime - The time (simulation time) of the registered breakpoint.
